alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 7:42PM CDT until March 30 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR EASTERN ITAWAMBA AND EASTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 742 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Red Bay to near Kolola Springs, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Fulton, Smithville, Tremont, Fairview, New Salem, Clay, Hatley, Gattman, Eastman, Quincy, Turon, Wise Gap, Sipsey Fork, New Hamilton, Becker, Cardsville, Tilden and Splunge. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
